kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Request Should Be Successful
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is a client or server error (4xx, 5xx).

kw.name: Validar se a chave "code" esta preenchida
Convert To Integer
kw.doc: Converts the given item to an integer number.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
